bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Map of Proposed Cuban-American Memorial, [by Philip Showalter Hench], April 1948

div1.p: This is a plan for a proposed Cuban-American Memorial at the site of Camp Lazear. Specified are building locations and orientation to the surrounding area.

div1.head: Map of Proposed Cuban-American Memorial, [by Philip Showalter Hench], April 1948
div1.opener:
DR. PHILIP S. HENCH
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINN.
div1.p:
Quarry
make New road to quarries

All this is now a
corn field

Former Site of
“Building #2”
(Could place small monument or
public fountain here)

Proposed Cuban-American Memorial
at “CAMP LAZEAR”
(Rear of Finca San Jose, Quemados)

Suggestions by
DR. PHILIP S, HENCH
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINN.
